member.name: M:OpenBveApi.Objects.Glow.GetAttenuationData(System.Double,OpenBveApi.Objects.GlowAttenuationMode)
member.summary: Creates glow attenuation data from a half distance and a mode. The resulting value can be later passed to SplitGlowAttenuationData in order to reconstruct the parameters.
member.param: The distance at which the glow is at 50% of its full intensity. The value is clamped to the integer range from 1 to 4096. Values less than or equal to 0 disable glow attenuation.
member.returns: A System.UInt16 packed with the information about the half distance and glow attenuation mode.

member.summary: Recreates the half distance and the glow attenuation mode from a packed System.UInt16 that was created by GetGlowAttenuationData.
member.param: The half distance of glow attenuation.

member.name: T:OpenBveApi.Graphics.TransparencyMode
member.summary: Defines the behaviour of the renderer for transparent textures

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Graphics.TransparencyMode.Performance
member.summary: Textures using color-key transparency are considered opaque, producing good performance but crisp outlines. Partially transparent faces are rendered in a single pass with z-buffer writes disabled, producing good performance but more depth-sorting issues.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Graphics.TransparencyMode.Intermediate
member.summary: Textures using color-key transparency are considered opaque, producing good performance but crisp outlines. Partially transparent faces are rendered in two passes, the first rendering only opaque pixels with z-buffer writes enabled, and the second rendering only partially transparent pixels with z-buffer writes disabled, producing best quality but worse performance.

member.name: F:OpenBveApi.Graphics.TransparencyMode.Quality
member.summary: Textures using color-key transparency are considered partially transparent. All partially transparent faces are rendered in two passes, the first rendering only opaque pixels with z-buffer writes enabled, and the second rendering only partially transparent pixels with z-buffer writes disabled, producing best quality but worse performance.

members.member: Creates a new instance of this class. The location of the front of the train, in meters. The speed of the train. The pressure in the brake cylinder, in pascal. The pressure in the main reservoir, in pascal. The pressure in the emergency reservoir, in pascal. The pressure in the brake pipe, in pascal. The pressure in the straight air pipe, in pascal. The curve radius at the front of the train, in meters. The cant value for this curve radius. The pitch value at the front of the train. Three paramaters added at the far end
